abstract.t: This document describes required extensions to the Multiple AccessProtocol over SONET/SDH/DWDM(MAPOS) protocol suite described inRFC2171-2176. The following extensions are discussed; the use ofself-synchronous scrambler, strong recommendation for the use ofCRC32, the use of abort sequence, and an algorithm to automateprotocol selection among MAPOS 8, MAPOS 16, and PPP.
